title: WATCH: Best of Jamie Carragher v Gary Neville ahead of their special episode of The Debate
description: Ahead of Thursday night's special episode of The Debate, watch Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville's best jibes from years gone by.
content: Enemies on the pitch during their playing days, Carra and Neville have formed a punditry partnership on Sky Sports, working together on Monday Night Football and various other live events.And while the pair have focused heavily on in-depth analysis during their time at Sky Sports, they have never missed an opportunity to poke fun at one another.Be it about Neville's stint at Valencia, or Carragher's pace at the back, the above video features their funniest interactions from the past few years.Thursday night's The Debate see just Carragher and Neville go head-to-head, as they discuss the Deadline Day that was, the race for the top four, and much more.Tune in to Carragher v Neville on The Debate tonight from 10pm on Sky Sports Premier League
